name: Trudge (shuu-glitch)
description:
Trudge is an easy, short single-player 2D-runner prototype where the player runs through forests surrounding a nearby-clearing. You've escaped the scene of battle, deserting your dead comrades and cowardly generals, and you need to collect as much you need to start a new life! Have fun (and watch out for landmines)!

Action Key/Mouse Interact With/Skip Text Left Click JumpSpacebarPower-UpZ

This game was made for DATT 2300!

Game by: Lilian Ilodigwe (218514976)

Asset Credit:

Here is a list of all the assets I used by category! All of them were found on Itch.io, and most of them were free with the exception of one being like, $1 USD. I did not have time to make a credits menu in-game, but I will put one in the itch.io page. Credit goes to the artists, sound designers, and the class tutorials for the making of this project!
